agent_utterance: Tonight’s ultra-simple step: at the same fixed time each evening, pause for 60 seconds, drink a glass of water, and log your urge level (0–10). Then commit to one small, planned snack option (e.g., a piece of fruit or a small yogurt) if you decide to eat, and record what you did. Keeping it ultra-simple and scheduled preserves structure and supports gradual, healthier choices.

If not, choose a tiny non-food coping (e.g., a quick tidy task or a short walk) and re-check in.
